content.rendered:
LATEST NEWS

TNPSC Group II, II-A & IV Online Class Starts from 20/01/2020 | Test Batch Starts from 18/01/2020 | GYM & Hostel Facility available

Best TNPSC Coaching Centre

Chennai IAS academy has earned the enviable reputation of a premier TNPSC coaching centre in Vellore. As one of the best institutes for providing coaching for Group I & II examinations, we have helped more than 600 candidates clear the TNPSC examination, over the years.

Enquiry Form

Fill the form below. Our Student counsellor will get back to you shortly.

(Including study Materials & Test series)

TNPSC Group I, II & IIA (Prelims & Mains)

Course NameDate & TimingsDuration
Fees

Special Course SSC + TNPSCRegular & Weekend Batch 1 YearRs. 20,000

Course Includes

  • Study Materials
  • Foundation course (Samacheer New & Old book)
  • Monthly Current Affairs (Current Affairs King)
  • Syllabus wise Weekly Test
  • Prelim’s Test Series (35 tests)
  • Samacheer book Standard wise Test (20 tests)
  • Subject wise test(10 tests)
  • Full test (5 tests)
  • Mains Test Series (20 Tests)

Our Highlights

  • A well-experienced faculty team
  • Guest Lectures by Officers
  • Mentorship (Personal Guidance)
  • Individual Attention
  • Continuous Student Assessment
  • Interview Guidance

TNPSC

Our Admission Process:

  • We have chosen the principle of “first-come-first-served” as the basis of admission in our institute,
  • The candidates or their representatives are required to be present at CHENNAI IAS ACADEMY office, with the duly filled-up application form with one passport size and one stamp size photographs, photocopy of valid photo ID & Address Proof of the candidate.
  • After admission to any of the course, if there is any indiscipline or misbehavior on the part of the students, they may be expelled, without any explanation. The right to rusticate rests solely with the management.

Course fees include: Classes, Study Materials, Test Series, Previous Question paper & Monthly UPSC Current Affairs

TNPSC Gr I Exam
TNPSC Group II & II-A Exam
TNPSC Group IV Exam

TNPSC Group I Exam Pattern

TNPSC group 1 exam will be conducted in three successive stages namely

  • Preliminary Exam
  • Main Written Exam
  • Interview

he Preliminary Examination is meant to serve as a screening test only. The marks obtained in the Preliminary Examination by the applicants who are declared qualified for admission to the Main Written Examination will not be counted for determining their final order of merit.

Prelims – Objective Type

SubjectQuestionsMarks
General Studies150225
Aptitude & Mental ability5075
TOTAL200300

TNPSC Group I Syllabus

Candidates who interested in TNPSC group 1 Exam can get the details of the syllabus and scheme below

Prelims & Mains Tamil Medium
 or
Prelims & Mains English Medium

Mains – Descriptive Type

S.NoPaper 1Paper 2Paper 3MarksDuration
1Modern history of India and Indian cultureIndian polity & Emerging political Trends across the world affecting India & geography of IndiaCurrent events of national & international importance2503 Hours
2General aptitude & mental abilityTamil society, its culture & heritage /English skillsCurrent economic trends Indian economy & impact of global economy in India 2503 Hours
3Role and impact of science & Technology in the development of India & Tamil NaduAdministration of union & states with special reference to Tamil NaduSocio economic problems of India / Tamil Nadu2503 Hours
Interview 120
Total Marks870

TNPSC Group – 1 Service

  • Deputy Collector
  • Deputy Superintendent of Police (Category-I).
  • Deputy Registrar of Co-operative Societies.
  • Assistant Director of Rural Development Department.
  • Assistant Commissioner in the Tamil Nadu Hindu Religious and Charitable
  • Endowments Administration Department.
  • Assistant Commissioner – Commercial Tax officer.
  • District Registrar.
  • Divisional Officer in Fire and Rescue services Department.
  • Assistant Conservator of Forest.
  • District Employment Officer.

TNPSC Group II & II-A Exam Pattern

TNPSC Group 2 Exam will be conducted in three successive stages
TNPSC Group 2-A Exam will be conducted in two successive stages.

  • Preliminary Exam (For Group II & IIA)
  • Main Written Exam (For Group II & IIA)
  • Interview (For Group II Only)

Prelims – Objective Type

SubjectQuestionsMarks
General Studies175262.5
Aptitude & Mental ability2537.5
TOTAL200300

TNPSC Group II & IIA Syllabus

Candidates who interested in TNPSC group 2 & 2A Exam can get the details of the syllabus and scheme below

Prelims Tamil Medium
 or
Prelims English Medium
Mains Guidelines
 or
Group Exam Where to Study

Mains – Descriptive Type

PAPER – I SSLC Standard (90 Minutes)

S.NoTitleNo.of
questions to be asked		MarksTotal Marks
1Tamil to English Translation22550
2English to Tamil Translation22550
Total Marks100

Note : Minimum Qualifying (Marks – 25)

(Answer sheets of the candidates who do not secure minimum qualifying marks in Part A will not be considered for the evaluation of Part B)

For Group II Interview Posts

Main Written Examination: 300 Marks
Oral Test: 40 Marks
Total Marks: 300+40 = 340 Marks
Minimum Qualifying Mark fsor all Communities: 102 out of 340

PAPER – II DEGREE Standard (3 Hrs)

S.NoTitleNo.of
questions to be asked		MarksTotal Marks
1Precis Writing2360
2Comprehension2360
3Hints Development2360
4Essay Writing
on ‘Thirukkural’		2360
5Letter writing
(Official)		2360
Total Marks300

Note : (This part has to be answered fully in Tamil or in English alone)
(Paper – I Marks cannot be considered for this exam
Paper – II Marks only considered for the final selection)

For Group IIA Non-Interview Posts

Main Written Examination: 300 Marks
Total Marks: 300
Minimum Qualifying Marks for all Communities: 90

TNPSC Group II – Service

  • Deputy Commercial Tax Officer (DCTO).
  • Sub Registrar.
  • Probation Officer in the Prison Department.
  • Assistant Inspector of Labor.
  • Junior Employment Officer.
  • Assistant Section Officer in Law Department/ TNPSC/ Finance
  • Department/Various Departments in the Tamil Nadu Ministerial Service/Secretariat Service.
  • Assistant Inspector in Local Fund Audit Department.
  • Special Assistant in the Vigilance and Anti-Corruption Department
  • Audit Inspector in the Audit Wing of Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments.
  • Supervisor of Industrial Co-operatives.
  • Senior Inspector of cooperative societies.

TNPSC Group II-A Service

  • Accountant in Treasuries and Accounts Department.
  • Assistant in Forest Department.
  • Personal clerk in Finance Department, Secretariat.
  • Personal clerk in (other than Law and Finance Dept) Secretariat.
  • Personal Clerk in Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission.
  • Personal Clerk in Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly.
  • Assistant in various Departments in the Tamil Nadu Ministerial
  • Service/Secretariat Service/Legislative Assembly Secretariat Service
  • Assistant in the Divisions of Commercial Taxes Department.
  • Handloom Inspector.

Objective Type ( S.S.L.C Standard) - Single Paper

SubjectQuestionsMarks
General Studies175262.5
Aptitude & Mental ability2537.5
TOTAL200300

TNPSC Group IV Syllabus

Candidates who interested in TNPSC group 4 Exam can get the details of the syllabus and scheme below

Tamil Medium
 or
English Medium

TNPSC CCSE IV – Services

  • Junior Assistant.
  • Steno Typist − Grade III.
  • EXECUTIVE OFFICER, GRADE-III in the Tamil Nadu Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments Administration Department.
  • Junior Assistant (Security).
  • Bill Collector Grade-I.
  • Junior Assistant (Non-Security).
  • VAO (Village Administrative Officer)
